alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:22PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lackawanna and northeastern Luzerne Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 822 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scranton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Dunmore, Old Forge, Pittston, Archbald, Blakely, Taylor, Dickson City, Moosic and Exeter. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 175 and 197. Interstate 84 between 1 and 4. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 115 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
